metadata.subject: Censorship
metadata.title: Veu par la Cour la requeste presentée par le Procureur General du Roy ..
metadata.creator: France.Parlement (Paris)
France. Parlement (Paris)
Eustace, abbé. Cas de conscience
Couet, Bernard. Cas de conscience
Catholic Church. Diocese of Poitiers (France). Bishop, 1702-1732 (Jean Claude de La Poype de Vertrieu)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 3 no. 14
metadata.description: Manuscript on paper. Title from opening lines of text
Forbids the publication by the Bishop of Poitiers of a condemnation of Cas de conscience proposé par un confesseur de province, variously attributed to Abbé Eustace, or Bernard Couet
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Title page and cover are combined.
